snippet.title: VAGRIENT Trailer Gameplay Pre-release
snippet.description:
VAGRIENT is an upcoming indie sci-fi action/adventure game full of exploration, combat, character progression, puzzle solving and obstacle clearing!

The game is being solo developed by Andrew Bray and is scheduled to be released on Steam end 2024.
